General.Name: tsh biopharmoration Ltd
General.Description: TSH Biopharm Corporation Limited develops and markets medicines for chronic diseases in Taiwan. It offers products for cardiovascular, central nervous, gastrointestinal, and others, as well as liquid-biopsy diagnosis. The company is headquartered in Taipei city, Taiwan. TSH Biopharm Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of TTY Biopharm Company Limited.

1.Name: Ms. Chen-Ju  Kan
1.Title: Mang. of Fin. & Accounting and Department of Admin.

2.Name: Mr. Xin-Yang  Liu
2.Title: Vice Gen. Mang. of Gen. Admin.
